column4: anyone know anything about blu-ray playback support under Linux ?
the article says it is working but you have to encrypt something
ah i see you have to cop them to hdd and "crack" them. ok that is very bad
but it has u dumping files to the HD and unencrypting keys
maybe powerdvd for linux can play it like on windows? (non free software)
was not aware powerdvd was on linux
i a found a slution but atm i have only a german link, i will look if i find an english one
interesting ... but still a long way from native Linux support.... damn that DRM
yes of course, but maybe better then nothing
